sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Pay-Per-Call Services Consumer Protection Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.
sections.text:
As used in this Act, the following terms have
the meanings set forth herein.

sections.heading: Rules applicable to the pay-per-call industry.
sections.text: Rules applicable to the pay-per-call industry.

sections.heading: Identification of information provider.
sections.text:
The
telecommunication carrier of any pay-per-call telephone information service
must provide, upon verbal or written request, the name, address and
telephone number of the actual provider of information service.

sections.heading: This Act takes effect on January 1, 1992.
sections.text: This Act takes effect on January 1, 1992.
